meanings.sent1: The vrot apple had a foul smell.
meanings.sent3: The vrot banana made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The vrot smell filled the room like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The vrot meat was a disgusting sight.

meanings.sent1: Leaves vrot when left in damp places.
meanings.sent2: If you leave food out, it will vrot.
meanings.sent3: The fruit vroted quickly in the hot sun.
meanings.sent4: Neglect can cause relationships to vrot away.
meanings.sent5: Time can vrot away even the strongest structures.

meanings.definition: (noun) A state of decay or rotting
meanings.sent1: The vrot of the fallen tree attracted insects.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the vrot in the old building's foundation.
meanings.sent3: The vrot in the fridge was a science experiment gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The vrot of corruption spread through the government.
meanings.sent5: The vrot of neglect was evident in the abandoned house.
